cff-item cff-status-post cff-box cff-shadow author-freer-isd cff-700558203300483 cff-new

p.span: Attention Freer High School students, ACE has setup a Google Classroom for your use. In this Google Classrooms, you will find at home workout videos, Apply Texas and Financial aid Power Point presentations, and other resources. Please use the code: jcvfmzs to add yourself. We can't wait to see you there!

div.class: cff-item cff-status-post cff-box cff-shadow author-freer-isd cff-700558203300483 cff-new

p.span:
Governor Abbot has announced that Texas schools will remain closed for the 2019-20 school year due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Texas school districts are still required to continue virtual learning and instructional delivery according to their academic calendars. Freer ISD will continue instructional delivery using the same methods that have been occurring during this school closure until May 28, 2020. Freer ISD will be exploring options on high school graduation that will be in compliance with state and local requirement for social distancing. Information on graduation will be released in the future.
Thank you
Conrad Cantu

cff-item cff-status-post cff-box cff-shadow author-freer-isd cff-700558203300483 cff-new

p.span:
NTE Family: We will have after-hours tutoring for elementary students. If your child needs help with their school work. There are google hangouts set up for Math and reading: links were sent out via remind.
TUESDAYS AND THURSDAYS - 5PM TILL 8PM
Kinder through 2nd Grade Math
3rd through 5th Grade Math
WEDNESDAYS AND FRIDAYS - 5PM TILL 8PM
Kinder through 2nd Grade Reading
3rd through 5th Grade Reading

p.span:
Need Internet Access??
AT&T is offering two months of free service, $5/mo. or $10/mo. plus taxes and fees thereafter, depending on your speed, for new Access customers who order by April 30, 2020.
This program is for Households with at least one resident who participates in the Supplemental Nutritional Assistance Program (SNAP) AND
IN ADDITION IN RESPONSE TO COVID-19 AT&T is:
• Expanding eligibility based on income and to households participating in National School Lunch Program or ‌Head Start
• Waiving all home internet data overage fees
APPLY ONLINE
att.com/access

p.a: Access from AT&T - Discount Internet Access

div.span: The Access program from AT&T provides discounted Internet access at affordable monthly rated for qualified customers.

div.p: Freer ISD and CACOST have partnered to bring a world class educational experence to the students of Freer ISD. Offering full day pre-k 3 and pre-k 4 classes fully staffed with two teachers to ensure every student has the opprutunity to learn in a warm and nurturing environment.
